item.title: Nginx and ASP.NET Core: Running both HTTP REST and gRPC services at once
item.author: Author
item.description: gRPC services are great - they’re fast and lightweight. However, for many use cases, REST WebAPI is also desirable. This post explains how to run them both at once.

item.title: Migrating from Wordpress to Hugo
item.author: Author
item.description: Recently I migrated this very blog from Wordpress to Hugo. It wasn’t a hard task, nor it was a very long one - but still I encountered some challenges, so I decided to document that. Plus when a change like this happens, some explanation is needed anyway.
